languages.text: Вывезенная с Летуса десятина стала спасением для погибающих миров Простора. Вольный Торговец не скупил{mf|лся|лась}, чтобы помочь не только своему протекторату, но и соседям. Не все понимали подобное милосердие, однако роль фон Валанциус в спасении целых систем была неоспорима. Вскоре некоторые миры стали оспаривать выделенный им размер помощи, а другие и вовсе отказались выплачивать десятину. В итоге слишком многие потратили бесценный дар жизни на кровавые бунты и бессмысленные распри.
languages.translation_comment:
Всю десятину забрали себе
схизматик
или забрали десятину и доминирует схизматик соулмарка

Всю десятину забрали себе
схизматик
или забрали десятину и доминирует схизматик соулмарка

languages.text: The tithe taken from Leethus was a lifeline for many dying worlds in the Expanse. The Rogue Trader spared no expense in helping not only {mf|his|her} own protectorate, but the neighbouring stars as well. Not everyone was understanding of such charity, but the role of House von Valancius in saving entire systems was beyond any doubt. After a time, some worlds began objecting to the volume of aid they were receiving, while others altogether balked at paying their tithe. In the end, all too many of them came to waste their precious gift of life on bloody revolts and senseless infighting.
languages.original_text: Вывезенная с Летуса десятина стала спасением для погибающих миров Простора. Вольный Торговец не скупил{mf|лся|лась}, чтобы помочь не только своему протекторату, но и соседям. Не все понимали подобное милосердие, однако роль фон Валанциус в спасении целых систем была неоспорима. Вскоре некоторые миры стали оспаривать выделенный им размер помощи, а другие и вовсе отказались выплачивать десятину. В итоге слишком многие потратили бесценный дар жизни на кровавые бунты и бессмысленные распри.

traits.locale_text: The tithe taken from Leethus was a lifeline for Koronus's dying worlds. The Rogue Trader spared no expense in helping not only {mf|his|her} own protectorate, but {mf|his|her} neighbours as well. Not everyone was understanding of such charity, but the role of House von Valancius in saving entire systems was beyond any doubt. After a while, some worlds began to object to the volume of aid they were receiving, while others altogether balked at paying their tithe. In the end, too many wasted their precious gift of life on bloody revolts and senseless infighting.

Not everyone was understanding of such charity, but the role of House von Valancius in saving entire systems was beyond any doubt. After a while, some worlds began to object to the volume of aid they were receiving, while others altogether balked at paying their tithe. In the end, too many wasted their precious gift of life on bloody revolts and senseless infighting.

In the end, all too many of them came to waste their precious gift of life on bloody revolts and senseless infighting.

languages.text: Der Zehnt von Leethus rettete viele sterbende Welten in der Ausdehnung. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} scheute keine Kosten, um nicht nur {mf|seinem|ihrem} eigenen Protektorat zu helfen, sondern auch den benachbarten Sternen. Nicht alle hatten Verständnis für diese Wohltätigkeit, aber die Bedeutung des Hauses Valancius bei der Rettung ganzer Systeme stand außer Zweifel. Nach einer Weile erhoben einige Welten Einspruch gegen das Ausmaß der Unterstützung, das sie erhielten, während andere die Zahlung ihres Zehnts komplett verweigerten. Am Ende verschwendeten nur allzu viele ihr wertvolles Geschenk des Lebens an blutige Aufstände und sinnlose interne Streitigkeiten.
languages.original_text: The tithe taken from Leethus was a lifeline for many dying worlds in the Expanse. The Rogue Trader spared no expense in helping not only {mf|his|her} own protectorate, but the neighbouring stars as well. Not everyone was understanding of such charity, but the role of House von Valancius in saving entire systems was beyond any doubt. After a time, some worlds began objecting to the volume of aid they were receiving, while others altogether balked at paying their tithe. In the end, all too many of them came to waste their precious gift of life on bloody revolts and senseless infighting.

traits.locale_text: Der Zehnt von Leethus rettete viele sterbende Welten in der Ausdehnung. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} scheute keine Kosten, um nicht nur {mf|seinem|ihrem} eigenen Protektorat zu helfen, sondern auch den benachbarten Sternen. Nicht alle hatten Verständnis für diese Wohltätigkeit, aber die Bedeutung des Hauses Valancius bei der Rettung ganzer Systeme stand außer Zweifel. Nach einer Weile erhoben einige Welten Einspruch gegen das Ausmaß der Unterstützung, das sie erhielten, während andere die Zahlung ihres Zehnts komplett verweigerten. Am Ende verschwendeten nur allzu viele ihr wertvolles Geschenk des Lebens an blutige Aufstände und sinnlose interne Streitigkeiten.

languages.text: La dîme prélevée sur Leethus permit de sauver bon nombre de mondes à l'agonie des Étendues. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ne lésina pas sur les moyens pour aider non seulement son propre protectorat, mais également les planètes voisines, une charité que beaucoup désapprouvèrent, mais nul ne put contester que des systèmes entiers ne devaient leur salut qu'à la générosité de la maison von Valancius. Après un certain temps, certains mondes commencèrent à se plaindre de ne pas recevoir assez d'aide, tandis que d'autres refusèrent même de payer la dîme. Bon nombre d'entre eux finirent consumés par des révoltes sanglantes et des querelles intestines insensées, gaspillant le précieux don de la vie.
languages.original_text: The tithe taken from Leethus was a lifeline for many dying worlds in the Expanse. The Rogue Trader spared no expense in helping not only {mf|his|her} own protectorate, but the neighbouring stars as well. Not everyone was understanding of such charity, but the role of House von Valancius in saving entire systems was beyond any doubt. After a time, some worlds began objecting to the volume of aid they were receiving, while others altogether balked at paying their tithe. In the end, all too many of them came to waste their precious gift of life on bloody revolts and senseless infighting.

traits.locale_text: La dîme prélevée sur Leethus permit de sauver bon nombre de mondes à l'agonie des Étendues. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ne lésina pas sur les moyens pour aider non seulement son propre protectorat, mais également les planètes voisines, une charité que beaucoup désapprouvèrent, mais nul ne put contester que des systèmes entiers ne devaient leur salut qu'à la générosité de la maison von Valancius. Après un certain temps, certains mondes commencèrent à se plaindre de ne pas recevoir assez d'aide, tandis que d'autres refusèrent même de payer la dîme. Bon nombre d'entre eux finirent consumés par des révoltes sanglantes et des querelles intestines insensées, gaspillant le précieux don de la vie.

languages.text: 从利瑟斯挪用来的什一税资源，成为了科罗努斯扩区许多垂死世界的生命线。行商浪人不仅不遗余力地守护自己的王朝，还同样对邻人伸出援手。并非所有人都能理解行商浪人的仁慈之举，但毫无疑问，冯·瓦兰修斯家族拯救了无数星系。过了一段时间后，部分世界对收到的援助感到不满，而另一部分世界则不愿再支付什一税。到最后，太多太多人浪费掉了好不容易延续下来的生命，死在了血腥的叛乱与毫无意义的内斗之中。
languages.original_text: The tithe taken from Leethus was a lifeline for many dying worlds in the Expanse. The Rogue Trader spared no expense in helping not only {mf|his|her} own protectorate, but the neighbouring stars as well. Not everyone was understanding of such charity, but the role of House von Valancius in saving entire systems was beyond any doubt. After a time, some worlds began objecting to the volume of aid they were receiving, while others altogether balked at paying their tithe. In the end, all too many of them came to waste their precious gift of life on bloody revolts and senseless infighting.

从利瑟斯挪用来的什一税资源，成为了科罗努斯扩区无数垂死世界的生命线。行商浪人不仅不遗余力地守护自己的王朝，还同样对邻人伸出援手。并非所有人都能理解行商浪人的仁慈之举，但毫无疑问，冯·瓦兰修斯家族拯救了无数星系。过了一段时间后，部分世界对收到的援助感到不满，而另一部分世界则不愿再支付什一税。到最后，太多太多人浪费掉了好不容易延续下来的生命，死在了血腥的叛乱与毫无意义的内斗之中。

languages.text: El diezmo obtenido de Leethus supuso la salvación de muchos mundos moribundos de la Extensión. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no reparó en gastos para ayudar no solo a su propio protectorado, sino también a las estrellas vecinas. No todos entendieron su bondad, pero el papel de la casa von Valancius como salvadora de sistemas al completo era innegable. Después de un tiempo, algunos mundos empezaron a protestar por la cantidad de ayuda recibida, mientras que otros expresaron rechazo ante la obligación de pagar su diezmo. Finalmente, demasiados de ellos acabaron desperdiciando el preciado don de la vida en revueltas sangrientas y luchas internas absurdas.
languages.original_text: The tithe taken from Leethus was a lifeline for many dying worlds in the Expanse. The Rogue Trader spared no expense in helping not only {mf|his|her} own protectorate, but the neighbouring stars as well. Not everyone was understanding of such charity, but the role of House von Valancius in saving entire systems was beyond any doubt. After a time, some worlds began objecting to the volume of aid they were receiving, while others altogether balked at paying their tithe. In the end, all too many of them came to waste their precious gift of life on bloody revolts and senseless infighting.

traits.locale_text: El diezmo obtenido de Leethus supuso la salvación de muchos mundos moribundos de la Extensión. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no reparó en gastos para ayudar no solo a su propio protectorado, sino también a las estrellas vecinas. No todos entendieron su bondad, pero el papel de la casa von Valancius como salvadora de sistemas al completo era innegable. Después de un tiempo, algunos mundos empezaron a protestar por la cantidad de ayuda recibida, mientras que otros expresaron rechazo ante la obligación de pagar su diezmo. Finalmente, demasiados de ellos acabaron desperdiciando el preciado don de la vida en revueltas sangrientas y luchas internas absurdas.

languages.text: リーザスから徴収された租税は、エクスパンスに存在する多くの瀕死の惑星にとっては命綱だった。ローグトレーダーは、自らの保護領だけでなく、近隣の惑星も支援することに一切の出費を惜しまなかった。すべての者がその慈善を理解したわけではなかったが、フォン・ヴァランシウス家が複数の星系を救ったという事実には疑いの余地がなかった。やがて、一部の惑星は受け取る援助の量に異議を唱えるようになり、また別の者たちは租税の支払い自体を拒むようになった。結局のところ、あまりにも多くの惑星がその貴重な命の恩恵を、血にまみれた反乱や無意味な内輪揉めの中で浪費してしまった。
languages.original_text: The tithe taken from Leethus was a lifeline for many dying worlds in the Expanse. The Rogue Trader spared no expense in helping not only {mf|his|her} own protectorate, but the neighbouring stars as well. Not everyone was understanding of such charity, but the role of House von Valancius in saving entire systems was beyond any doubt. After a time, some worlds began objecting to the volume of aid they were receiving, while others altogether balked at paying their tithe. In the end, all too many of them came to waste their precious gift of life on bloody revolts and senseless infighting.

traits.locale_text: リーザスから徴収された租税は、エクスパンスに存在する多くの瀕死の惑星にとっては命綱だった。ローグトレーダーは、自らの保護領だけでなく、近隣の惑星も支援することに一切の出費を惜しまなかった。すべての者がその慈善を理解したわけではなかったが、フォン・ヴァランシウス家が複数の星系を救ったという事実には疑いの余地がなかった。やがて、一部の惑星は受け取る援助の量に異議を唱えるようになり、また別の者たちは租税の支払い自体を拒むようになった。結局のところ、あまりにも多くの惑星がその貴重な命の恩恵を、血にまみれた反乱や無意味な内輪揉めの中で浪費してしまった。

languages.text: Leethus'tan alınan aşar, Enginlik'te can çekişen birçok dünyaya yeni bir umut oldu. Hür Tacir; sadece kendi himayesindekilere değil, komşu yıldızlara da yardım ederken hiçbir masraftan kaçınmadı. Böylesi bir hayırseverliği herkes anlayışla karşılamasa da von Valancius Hanesi'nin tüm sistemlere sahip çıkarak oynadığı rol su götürmezdi. Bir süre sonra bazı dünyalar aldıkları yardımın hacmine itiraz etmeye başlarken diğerleri, aşarlarını ödemekten hepten kaçınmaya başladı. Sonunda pek çoğu, bu değerli yaşam armağanını kanlı isyanlara ve anlamsız iç çatışmalara harcar oldu.
languages.original_text: The tithe taken from Leethus was a lifeline for many dying worlds in the Expanse. The Rogue Trader spared no expense in helping not only {mf|his|her} own protectorate, but the neighbouring stars as well. Not everyone was understanding of such charity, but the role of House von Valancius in saving entire systems was beyond any doubt. After a time, some worlds began objecting to the volume of aid they were receiving, while others altogether balked at paying their tithe. In the end, all too many of them came to waste their precious gift of life on bloody revolts and senseless infighting.
